item.title: Bowlero Corp 10-K
item.description: Bowlero Corp, which is in the Services-Amusement & Recreation Services [7900] industry, SEC 10-K filing on September 15, 2022 had 32241 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 355 instances stock - 300 instances financial - 277 instances 2022 - 248 instances 2021 - 242 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
